title: The Promoter of CDS shall try to pool lands belonging to various categories of land holders includin
clause_text: The Promoter of CDS shall try to pool lands belonging to various categories of land holders including Public lands by obtaining their consent for including their lands in the proposed CDS, by resorting to any of the following methods of land pooling: Purchase of lands, including buildings, if any, standing thereupon,
